listing.listing_description:
Glimpse classic Balinese style along with gorgeous ocean views at Villa Marie. Modeled on traditional compound-style homes, this six-bedroom vacation rental has sleek indoor-outdoor rooms that open to a beautifully appointed courtyard. A full staff and access to the shared amenities at the Pandawa Cliff Estate community ensure a holiday of pampered luxury.

Your stay at Villa Marie includes the services of a private chef, housekeeper, butler and driver, as well as access to a shared gym, spa, and tennis and squash courts. Relax with family and friends in outdoor living areas with a pool, plenty of daybeds, al-fresco dining for six, and a barbecue, or entertain indoors with the help of the television, surround sound system and Wi-Fi.

From the tranquil water feature in its garden to the ocean views from nearly every room, the villa shows thoughtful design that will make your stay a pleasure. Slide-away glass doors make the transition from the terrace to the great room nearly seamless, and an open-concept layout gives the living and dining areas a breezy, on-trend feel. While there is a fully equipped kitchen, the chef will be happy to prepare breakfast and other meals from a menu.

Villa Marie has four bedrooms with king beds, including two master suites: one with an al-fresco shower and one that opens to its own ocean-view terrace. The other two bedrooms have two twin beds each. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

While it’s tempting to stay at the villa and unwind, it’s well worth exploring the nearby Bukit area. Make the short drive to the white sands of Pandawa Beach for a honeymoon-worthy stroll, seek out some of Bali’s best surf breaks at other nearby beaches, try the eateries in the town of Nusa Dua, tee off at New Kuta Golf Club and learn local lore at the sea temple at Uluwatu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this villa is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Villa Desa Roro Estate is an extraordinary private paradise in Canggu, Bali. Situated about a kilometer from Batubelig Beach, the estate offers an unparalleled balance of exclusive seclusion and prime location. Constisting of two distinct villas—two-bedroom Villa Desa Roro Dua and five-bedroom Villa Desa Roro—the property features two swimming pools, outstanding alfresco and interior living spaces, and seven fabulous bedroom suites. Traditional Javanese joglo design and spectacular décor evoke the finest elements of the traditional Indonesian and Southeast Asian luxury aesthetic. Superb spa and yoga amenities invite families and friends to a unique retreat in one of the most sublime settings in Indonesia.

The beautifully landscaped estate features lush tropical coconut palms, colorful gardens, and verdant lawns. Two saltwater swimming pools, each twelve meters in length, are like twin lagoons in this tropical sanctuary. Savor exquisite days on the gorgeous wood pool deck, sunbathing and sipping cool drinks on elegant loungers. Practice yoga in the bale and enjoy afternoon refreshments on a sumptuous daybed.

Each villa features a fabulous, open-plan great room with traditional joglo ceiling, as well as a fully equipped kitchen and dining table. Exquisite wood floors and ceiling beams, along with superb traditional artwork and furnishings, create the ideal setting for serene evenings and mornings in this enchanted forest. Outstanding AV equipment, a home theater, and an exercise room ensure total comfort during your stay.

The two bedrooms in Villa Desa Roro Dua both feature king beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. In Villa Desa Roro, there are three bedrooms with king beds and two with queens, distributed within three stand-alone pavilions. All of the bedrooms features ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning. The spectacular master suite, in its own pavilion, includes a walk-in closet, private lounge and spa areas, and a stand-alone rain shower and tub in its bathroom.

Beyond the extraordinary privacy of your estate, you'll enjoy outstanding access to myriad riches of Bali. Several world-class beaches are within one to eight kilometers of your door, including Canggu, Petitegenet, Seminyak, and Echo. Seminyak Square is just five kilometers away, and the magnificent city of Ubud less than thirty. Golfers are an easy drive from Nirwana Bali.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let all your cares melt away as you spend vacation day after vacation day at this luxury beachfront estate—it’s one of our favorite villas in Bali, and offers spectacular views of the ocean. Many consider the island of Bali to be paradise on Earth, thanks to its beautiful landscape, sandy beaches and unique culture.

There are plenty of amenities on this property to indulge in. Relax on a cushioned chaise lounge by the swimming pool during the day, while at night you can soothe aching muscles in the jacuzzi. The view from the back terrace features panoramic views of palm trees swaying in front of softly rolling ocean waves. Meanwhile, inside there’s a home theater complete with a games room, pool table and a built-in bar. Guests here can also enjoy the use of a tennis court and relaxation pavilions, as well as the services of a chef, housekeeper and security guard.

With accommodations spread across a series of pavilions, the main pavilion includes an open-air living room that overlooks the landscaped backyard and ocean. Inside, it features neutral colored modern furnishings, wood accents, and a wide, vaulted ceiling. There’s also a spacious kitchen with a breakfast bar that comes fully equipped with stainless steel appliances.

This estate’s five bedrooms can comfortably sleep up to 10 guests. All rooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions and DVD players, while the two master suites boast walk-in closets. Most of the rooms also offer king size beds, with one suite’s two twins able to convert into a king.

The rugged, black sands of Cemagi Beach are just steps away from the villa, meanwhile, avid golfers can be at the nearest course—Nirwana—in just 9 km. Those looking to do some shopping can wander through the high-end boutiques at Seminyak, a 16 km journey from the home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nothing but bushland surrounds this wonderfully private villa on the shores of Lake Taupo. Watch the sun move across the mountains and water from the shade of the pergola on the terrace or beneath the vaulted ceiling of the open-concept great room. Hike to the footbridge over the roaring Huka Falls, cycle the nearby Great Lake Trail, or fish for trout—the only way to taste this local specialty. 

You’ll have to decide whether the views of Mine Bay are best from the swimming pool, hot tub, or the outdoor lounging and dining areas. If you’re lucky enough to have caught a local trout, try preparing it on the barbecue (or call a restaurant in Taupo to do the job). After a day out on the lake or in the mountains, the smart TV, Wi-Fi, and gas fireplace are ready to help you unwind. 

Fold-away glass walls make the great room feel like an extension of the sunny terrace. Here, you can stretch out on a wicker sofa, whip up something delicious in the fully equipped kitchen, or relive the day’s adventures with friends and family around a dining table for 8, all under a vaulted ceiling that makes the space bright and airy. 

Each of the 3 bedrooms at this luxury vacation rental has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; 2 of them have lake views and one opens directly to the terrace with the hot tub, for couples who might want to relive their honeymoon. 

The Point Villa Ngahere offers a quintessential New Zealand holiday, with gorgeous scenery, outdoor adventure and great food all close at hand. It’s a 1-minute drive to the Taupo Maori Carving, which can also be seen from the water on a kayak tour, and a short drive to both the brilliant blue waters of Huka Falls and the town of Taupo.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Translated, “Sayang D’Amour” means “Sweet Love,” and you will find plenty to adore at this vacation getaway, one of our most opulent villas in Bali. With lush private gardens and grounds, it’s located just a stone’s throw from downtown Seminyak, an area known for its outstanding restaurants, nightlife and legendary sunsets.

Indulge in a day of relaxation—the villa’s backyard will make you think you’re at your own private resort, thanks to colorful, cushy sun lounges with umbrellas, and a large pool. There’s a rooftop lounge surrounded by a landscaped tropical garden, perfect for evening drinks, or invite friends to join you for a formal alfresco dining. It’s also child-friendly with features like a splash pool and a custom-made cubby house for kids.

Once you walk inside, you’ll notice the French owners’ careful attention to detail—they have painstakingly curated luxurious furnishings from around the world. The elegant living room features a splash of color mixed with natural wood accents, while the media room is cozy and inviting. The fully equipped kitchen comes with an industrial size 8-burner gas stovetop, juicer, and wine fridge, and, best of all, private chef services.

Up to 12 guests can comfortably sleep in the villa’s six air conditioned bedrooms that are labeled with fun names like “French Kiss” and “Forever.” The master suite has a king-sized bed, daybed and writing desk, while three other rooms also boast king-sized beds and alfresco showers. The two remaining rooms feature two double beds each and ensuite bathrooms with bathtubs.

Villa Sayang d’Amour is located in the heart of Seminyak. Explore diverse cuisine in the town’s high-end restaurants or spend time at one of its famous spas, boutiques and art galleries. Take advantage of your villa’s car and driver service and spend an afternoon at Echo Beach, just 7 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This splendid four-bedroom villa occupies a gorgeous two-hectare estate, which flows down a terraced hillside in the rural hinterland of southwest Bali. The Arsana Estate provides the perfect setting for weddings, events and spiritual retreats, or quite simply for families or groups looking for a close-to-nature playground in which to relax away from the hustle and bustle of Bali’s more crowded tourist centre. At this very self-contained villa there is no real need to venture out at all, but a visit to the nearby village – one of the prettiest in Bali – or a bicycle ride along the tiny roads, past farmers tending their rice fields, should not be missed.

Arsana Estate is located about 11 km from the white sandy Echo beach in the district of Canggu, just a ten-minute drive from the greater Kuta/Seminyak area where the prime dining, shopping, and nightlife in Bali are located. Because of its slightly out of town setting, it has the double attraction of being relatively close to everything one might need, while being far enough away to retain a peaceful rural feel.

Complementing its heritage-themed architecture, Arsana Estate’s large open-sided, fan-cooled living pavilion is embellished with fascinating oriental antiques and tribal artefacts. This is a comfortable space for family and friends to socialize on the casual rattan lounge seating or gather at the three-meter long dining table.

Each bedroom is air-conditioned with an ensuite bathroom. The floor and ceiling of the bedrooms are of unique polished ironwood, and each bedroom has a patio overlooking the tropical gardens of the property.

The Arsana Estate blends its exceptional location with outstanding facilities, including swimming pools, a games room, fully stocked bars and dedicated massage areas. These are complemented by top levels of service from an exceptional team of staff headed by a knowledgeable villa manager and including an experienced, talented chef and a driver.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The perfect villa for an unforgettable golf trip, this Big Island two-bedroom is right on the edge of the Four Season’s Hualalai Golf Course. Whether you’re visiting with family, friends, colleagues, or for your honeymoon, Fairway Villa has an incredible atmosphere for any occasion. During your stay, you’ll have full access to the shared amenities of the Four Seasons resort (for an additional fee), and a golf cart to help you navigate its coastal estate. Within a few minutes' walk, you'll find the beach, golf course, shops, restaurants, and resort facilities.

Decorated with warm Hawaiian wood tones, vibrant floral patterns, and rich granite, this golf villa will have you feeling at one with the Big island’s beautiful environment in no time. Fairway’s open concept floor plan and large doorways to the patio create a spacious open-air feel inside, as well as allowing the ocean breeze to flow freely within. In the living room, you’ll appreciate the high-end electronics, sound system, and satellite television as you sink into plush designer furniture after a long day on the golf course. At dinner, the fully-equipped kitchen offers state of the art appliances, and plenty of functional working space.

Outside, the alfresco dining area is the perfect spot to watch fellow golfers enjoy the course, while you sip your favorite cocktail. If you feel like exploring the Four Season’s Resort, hop into the supplied golf cart and venture on to discover their swimming pool, spa, beachfront, sports club, and cabana areas. There are also plenty of activities for children at the Kids Club and Ocean Activity Centre.

For even more shopping and dining options, travel fifteen minutes to the Waikoloa Beach Resort, where you’ll enjoy a wide selection of international cuisine and everything from handcrafted souvenirs to high-end fashion outlets. And, to experience some authentic Hawaiian city life, the town of Kona is just twenty minutes from the resort.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: W41383633-01

listing.listing_description:
Slow down to the pace of island life at the blissfully secluded Villa Tantangan. Set on more than two private acres at the end of a stretch of unpaved road, this one-of-a-kind Bali vacation rental feels like a stylish retreat at the edge of the planet. Spend a dreamy holiday or honeymoon listening to the waves wash over the black-sand beach just in front of the property—and the laughter of your loved ones.

Your stay at the villa includes the services of a chef, housekeeper and villa manager, as well as a daily Indonesian or continental breakfast. Outdoor living areas with a pool, sun beds and plenty of loungers are tucked into lush gardens designed by renowned artist John Pettigrew, creating a beautiful contrast between the manicured grounds and the wild sea. Inside, you’ll find amenities such as a media room, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.

Woven screens and slats of bamboo are all that separate the villa’s indoor living areas from the outdoor ones. Stretch out on generous sectionals that are the same shade of brilliant blue as the ocean or gather with friends and family at the dining table for six. Though chef service is included, the house does have a kitchen with a coffee press, juicer, rice cooker and more.

This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, terrace, lounge area and its own entrance. The other two bedrooms have, respectively, two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom, and a king bed and access to a hall bathroom.

From the villa’s beachfront location in the Tabanan area, it’s a short drive to the famed Tanah Lot Temple, the golf course at the Pan Pacific Nirwana Bali, several popular beaches, and shopping, dining and nightlife in Kuta. Of course, you can also choose to remain at the villa and simply enjoy the gorgeous surroundings.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Clean-lined contemporary architecture and towering palms are reflected back in the glass-like pool at this fully staffed modern complex in Canggu. Open-sided living areas invite the warm breezes indoors, and a stuffed-animal shelf welcomes kids. It’s a 3-minute drive to Echo Beach Club for grilled lobster and organic salads in an oceanfront setting, and 8 minutes to cafe-lined Batu Bolong Beach.

 The villa’s private courtyard is dominated by a huge pool, but also features plenty of loungers, an al-fresco living area, and a semi-outdoor kitchen. Stretch out on the indoor exercise equipment, flip on the Apple TV, or pour a glass from the wine fridge to sip as you scroll via Wi-Fi. Your holiday at this vacation rental begins with an airport transfer and welcome drink, and includes daily Indonesian breakfast.

 Teak ceilings and floors lend warm natural texture to the open-sided living and dining areas, while red details add pops of color. The look continues in the fully equipped kitchen, whose glossy black surfaces are broken up by red accents.

 This luxury villa has six bedrooms that are honeymoon-worthy escapes with king beds and their own entrances, as well as one bedroom with two twin beds. The children’s room has two twin bunk beds and a play area. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning for the warmest nights in the hot, humid Kabupaten Badung climate.

 If you’re traveling with the whole family, treat the kids to a day at nearby Taman Segura Madu Water Park and dinner at Echo Beach Club, which has a kids menu. If not, try surfing at the break at popular Batu Bolong Beach and relive your honeymoon on a sunset stroll at Berawa Beach. It’s all less than a 10-minute drive from the villa.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
